participant_1.background:
I am a spiritual person who finds peace in the quiet moments of my day.
my favorite thing to do is to read books on the beach.
i am a gymnast.
i am bald with a thick beard.
people say i have a cute laugh.

participant_2.background:
I am so proud of my daughter for graduating at the top of her class!
i am from san fransisco.
I'm proud of my swimming achievements in college and I'd brag to my friends about them if I were famous.
Comic Con is not my thing but I do love teaching and travelling.
i have bad luck with relationships.

content.text: Hey! My name is Eric and I'm from San Francisco
Nice to meet you Eric! I'm from San Francisco too!
Really? that's awesome! What do you like to do for fun?
I like teaching and traveling. I also love Comic Con but my daughter and I are the only ones in our family who do.
Oh that's interesting! My favorite thing to do is read books on the beach. I'm also a gymnast and I have a thick beard.
Oh cool! I love the beach but I don't think I've ever been a gymnast before.
You should try it! It's really fun and it's a great workout.
I might just do that! Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! I'm glad I could help.
That's a tough question! I have a lot of favorites but I'd have to say The Alchemist by Paulo Coelho.
I've heard good things about that book! I'll have to check it out.
I highly recommend it! It's a really great read.
